text: int main ( ) { int t , i , j , n , sum ; int a [ MAX ] [ MAX ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { a [ i ] [ j ] = 0 ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = n - 2 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { a [ i ] [ j ] += a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] > a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ? a [ i + 1 ] [ j ] : a [ i + 1 ] [ j + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
